tweet: Now you see how volatile this market is. I wasn't predicting that LTC will get to $20. I was saying that I've seen MANY 90% drops from ATH in BTC and LTC. Those that can withstand such a drop without flinching are the ones with lambos eventually. The others pay for these lambos.  https://t.co/ozcR11N68o

Boom! 💥  Aliant adds Litecoin support to their merchant solutions. This is e-commerce and most importantly also point of sale with Poynt terminal integration!  #PayWithLitecoin  https://t.co/F7J5WbVwn4

Nice! Hopefully they will turn on SegWit for Litecoin also. Litecoin doesn't have a capacity constraint yet, but it doesn't hurt and transaction fees will be lower when sending from a SegWit address.  https://t.co/CtdbqodJaV

The Aliant team is excited to announce that we are now offering our merchants the ability to accept Litecoin payments! Who's ready to #PayWithLitecoin?  https://t.co/lMpgGMQAGl Thanks to @SatoshiLite for creating the LTC we all love!
